title: Electrochemical oscillation during galvanostatic charging and discharging of Zr-modified Li4Ti5O12 in Li-ion batteries
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21799-21807

In Li-excessive Zr-modified Li4Ti5O12, the electrochemical oscillation is achieved during both charging and discharging in Li-ion batteries.
